com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.cdo

Class CDOConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.cdo.CDOConnectionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICDOConnectionFactory

    public class CDOConnectionFactory
extends Object
implements ICDOConnectionFactory
    ICDOConnectionFactory implementation for activating a ICDOConnectionManager instance and registering it to the application context under the hood to establish a connection between a CDO server and client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CDOConnectionFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void connect(String username, String password)
      Creates a CDOConnection object and connects to the the CDO repository specified by the registered ClientPreferences.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CDOConnectionFactory

        public CDOConnectionFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(User user)
             throws SnowowlServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ICDOConnectionFactory
        Creates a CDOConnection object and connects to the the CDO repository specified by the registered ClientPreferences. The specified User is supposed be already authenticated. The created connection will be automatically registered to the ApplicationContext as service.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ICDOConnectionFactory
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        Throws:
        SnowowlServiceException

      • connect

        public void connect(String username,
                    String password)
             throws SnowowlServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ICDOConnectionFactory
        Creates a CDOConnection object and connects to the the CDO repository specified by the registered ClientPreferences. The user will be authenticated with the given username and password. The created connection will be automatically registered to the ApplicationContext as service.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ICDOConnectionFactory
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Throws:
        SnowowlServiceException - if there was an error when connecting to CDO, or when the provided credentials are invalid
